institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: National Human Resources Development Consortium Operating Rules/Article 8 (Composition and Operation of Jury Pool)
contents: Article 8 (Composition and operation of reviewer pool) ① The chairman of the board may form a reviewer pool to support the deliberation committee pursuant to Article 9 and Article 5 of the same rule, and the reviewer pool shall include those who fall under any of the following items: Supports review of matters. Revised March 26, 2019, 1. Selection of joint training center and extension of support period pursuant to Article 9 of the Regulations, 2. Selection of joint training centers for pilot projects pursuant to Article 11 of the Regulations, 3. Projects pursuant to Articles 13 and 14 of the Regulations Review of the plan, 4. Other matters requested by the Chairman, ② Matters regarding composition and management of reviewers, etc. shall be operated in accordance with the management guidelines of professional competency development project experts. Revised 2020. 11. 12, ③ Deleted 2020. 11. 12, ④ Deleted 2020. 11. 12, ⑤ Deleted 2020. 11. 12, ⑥ The Corporation provides reviewers, etc. who participated in the review with the review committee in Appendix 2 within the budget. Allowances and travel expenses may be paid in accordance with the “Standards for Payment of Committee Allowances, etc.” Revised 2019. 3. 26.
